entries.title: Meta Posts $4.2 Billion Restructuring Charge
entries.description: The company, which is in the midst of shifting to become a metaverse business, also forecast revenue would beat Wall Street predictions.

entries.title: Meta Posts $4.2 Billion Restructuring Charge
entries.description: The company, which is in the midst of shifting to become a metaverse business, also forecast revenue would beat Wall Street predictions.

entries.title: OpenAI to Offer New Version of ChatGPT for a $20 Monthly Fee
entries.description: The San Francisco artificial intelligence lab has seen overwhelming interest in its chatbot since it was released in November.

entries.title: Judge Said to Allow Meta’s Deal for Virtual Reality Start-Up to Move Forward
entries.description: The ruling, which is under seal, is a defeat for the Federal Trade Commission, which tried to block Meta’s deal with a rarely used antitrust argument.

entries.title: Self-Driving Car Services Want to Expand in San Francisco Despite Recent Hiccups
entries.description: Waymo and Cruise hope to widen their projects to include more of the city. But local officials are increasingly concerned about breakdowns causing congestion.

entries.title: GoodRx Leaked User Health Data to Facebook and Google, F.T.C. Says
entries.description: The popular drug discount app deceptively shared details on users’ illnesses and medicines with ad firms, regulators said in a legal complaint.

entries.title: A.I. Bots Can’t Report This Column. But They Can Improve It.
entries.description: ChatGPT isn’t the only writing assistant that has emerged to replace editors. We tested it alongside two others to assess their strengths and weaknesses.
